about_the_game:
The Empty House - A Dementia Interactive Experience

What Remains When Memories Fade?

The Empty House is a surreal, short interactive narrative experience that plunges you into the unraveling mind of a woman suffering from advanced dementia. Reality is slipping away—memories distort, time loops, and familiar places become unfamiliar. As her perception of the world crumbles, you will navigate fragmented thoughts, cryptic choices, and eerie distortions of everyday life.

This is not a game of puzzles or action. This is an experiment in perception, a descent into forgetting, and an exploration of what it means to lose oneself.

 

This experience is more than just a story—it’s a glimpse into the fragile nature of memory, identity, and time.

A portion of the proceeds from this interactive film will be donated to organizations dedicated to dementia and Alzheimer’s research, helping to support patients, families, and the search for a cure.

By playing, you are not only exploring a fading mind—you are also helping those who face this reality every day.

 

🧠 A Mind Unraveling

You experience the story through her eyes, seeing the world as she does—a place filled with echoes of the past, fractured realities, and unsettling distortions. Objects appear and disappear. Familiar spaces feel alien. People become faceless specters. Each decision alters how she perceives the world, leading to multiple possible endings.

 

Will you resist the inevitable? Or will you let go?

🎥 A Unique Interactive FMV Experience

Using Full Motion Video (FMV) and cinematic storytelling, The Empty House blurs the line between film and game, creating an unsettling, immersive experience where choices feel deeply personal. Every flickering light, every fading voice, and every distorted reflection adds to the growing sense of disconnection from reality.

🕯️ Key Features:

🔹 A Surreal Interactive Story – Experience the world through the fractured perception of a fading mind.
🔹 Full Motion Video (FMV) & Cinematic Presentation – A visually immersive experience with real actors and filmed sequences.
🔹 Choices Matter – Every decision subtly reshapes the world, leading to multiple possible endings.
🔹 Psychological Horror Without Jumpscares – The horror here is existential, built on loss, confusion, and identity erosion.
🔹 Minimalist & Atmospheric Gameplay – No complex mechanics, just pure, immersive storytelling.
🔹 An Emotional Descent into Dementia – Explore a deeply personal and unsettling narrative about memory loss.

🔄 Many Paths, Many Endings

There is no single way to experience The Empty House. Some choices will bring clarity. Others will deepen the confusion. Some will lead to a quiet acceptance. Others… will leave you lost forever.

Every playthrough is a chance to uncover new fragments of memory—or let them slip away.

🧩 Who is This Game For?

🔸 Fans of narrative-driven, experimental interactive experiences
🔸 Players who enjoy psychological and existential horror without traditional jumpscares
🔸 Those interested in surreal, atmospheric storytelling and unique FMV gameplay
🔸 Anyone looking for a deeply emotional and thought-provoking journey

🫂 A Game With a Purpose

A portion of the proceeds from The Empty House will be donated to organizations dedicated to dementia and Alzheimer’s research, supporting patients, families, and the search for a cure.

By playing, you are not only exploring a fading mind—you are also helping those who face this reality every day.

🎬 Extra Content Included

✅ Short Movie – Watch the original short film that inspired The Empty House Interactive.
✅ Complete Making Of – Over an hour of behind-the-scenes content exploring the creation of this experimental experience.
✅ Trailer – The official cinematic trailer.
✅ Virtual Tour Through the House – Explore the entire house in a first-person FMV tour.
✅ And More – Additional surprises that deepen the mystery and meaning of the story.

 

Will You Hold On… Or Let Go?

There is a door ahead. Do you try to open it? Or do you turn away?

Your choice may be your last.
